alert.note: Alert for Butler; Chase; Harvey; Marion; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:55PM CDT until May 30 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN SEDGWICK...EASTERN HARVEY...CHASE...NORTHWESTERN BUTLER AND SOUTHEASTERN MARION COUNTIES... At 555 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Florence to near Valley Center, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Newton, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Maize, Marion, North Newton, Sedgwick, Colwich, Peabody, Cottonwood Falls, Whitewater, Strong City, Florence, Kechi, Andale, Bentley, Potwin and Walton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for south central, central and east central Kansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
